newsbody:
We will be assisting with Fleet coverage from 10:15a to 1:00p to allow fleet agents to attend Kathy's funeral.

Jessica, Noemi, Keith and Angie will be here while the rest of the Fleet team are out.  If we get a call that is outside the scope of our after hour training, we can try to call Jessica, Noemi, Keith or Angie.  Most likely they will be on another call.  That being the case, apologize to the customer and advise to call back after 1:00pm.

We’ve been granted an additional extension on the new 2-series MasterCard. Previously we communicated sites had until December 31, 2017 to be compliant.

However, now our Valero sites have until June 30, 2018 to upgrade hardware and/or software to support the new 2-series MasterCard. Failure to accept the new card will result in fines from MasterCard.

Gift card orders made through Sunday the 17th SHOULD be delivered before Christmas. Let the customer know that we cannot guarantee delivery due to shipping delays or extraneous issues but we will try our hardest to get orders out in a timely manner.

Orders made Monday and Tuesday will be shipped priority at our expense to attempt to get cards delivered before Christmas as well.

Please reiterate to the customer that we're making all attempts to get them their orders before Christmas but there could be factors that delay delivery past the holiday.
The allocations project is scheduled to kickoff first quarter! Stay tuned for more updates and information.

Due to an application platform change T+1 customers who would normally receive payments first thing this morning will experience a delay.  Barclays have guarantee that they will still receive their payment today but it will be later in the day.

Schedule can be found here.

Empire has provided their Commander deployment schedule. 

Important Note: The tech will call into our help desk during the install. Acumera will need to be engaged since the sites are migrating from Sapphire to Commander.

Click here for the master list.

We have a new process for handling Gempay 3 calls that must be raised with HTEC. Please check out the article as the process is changing quite a bit.

Please see article 491 for more info.
we have a quicklink to a new article: US Outage Procedures. This article outlines the procedures for handling a US outage. Please read up on the article.

Important

Please see article 469 for updates. Corporate is notifying stations that are not able to accept these cards this week which could generate some calls.

The vacation scheduler is now open.

Be sure to update your holiday preferences under Utilities > Holiday Preferences.

The deadline to submit all vacation requests is January 26th.

If you are requesting vacation in January or February, please email the dates to Debra as soon as possible.

newstitle: Valero Card Services Moratorium Christmas/New Year Period
newsbody:
In order to ensure smooth VCS operations over the holiday period, there will be a moratorium of any site activity from Friday 15th December 2017 until Friday 5th January 2018 inclusive.

 Please bear this in mind when planning your site activities. If you foresee any problems,  please can you let me know as soon as possible.

 Many thanks for your support.

 Julie Lunnon

Julie.Lunnon@valero.com
There has been an update to the CST / Acumera Pre-Activation Process.  Please review article 482 for information.
Test, please disregard.
Due to the time change this weekend in the UK, some Gempay 3 terminals have not updated. To update the time manually, follow the instructions in article 472.

CST is looking to install Commanders at 51 stores in November.  The start date is November 6 and will hopefully complete on November 22.  The installs will take place overnight, so upon completion of the install, the tech will call our help desk to request the Acumera activation ticket be closed.  Please follow the instructions in article 482.  Please also validate the merchant profile setup is correct, article 479.

On October 19th during our Maintenance window (between 3 and 6 am Eastern), we will be moving the routing associated with TNIP vlr01 in Kansas City to: asb-vlr0vtnip01 in Ashburn.

FPX Traffic will still flow as normal through the other 2 TNIP’s.
Site 28200-70896 is having an amount debited for $4,528.60 on tomorrow's business. This was due to an incorrect MID loaded Sept 20th and 22nd.

There is a planned IdM upgrade scheduled for Friday October 13th from 7pm to Saturday October 14th at 10pm (CDT). During this time, the External Customer Portals (US, Canadian and UK/IE) will still be available but the following features will not be available.

  • Registration
  • Forgot Password
  • Reset Password (used by Amarillo and the help desk)
  • Update user information, security questions and password (available under Account Settings within the portal)
  • Requesting new access

Once the upgrade is completed on Sunday, internal employees will notice a slightly different UI when approving role requests, requesting new access, etc. Please see article ZZZ for more information.
If you received an early release or time off prize from customer service week, turn the slip in with your name and requested date to Debra.

IMPORTANT

Please see Article 488 for new information regarding the pre-qualified application process.
Please see article # 479 for latest update.

newstitle: Verifone EMV - Mobile Payment Acceptance Issue
newsbody: An issue with acceptance of mobile payments (ApplePay, SamsungPay, …) has been identified with Verifone EMV software version 3.02.34.  This issue will be resolved in an upcoming release in October.  If calls are received, please let the caller know that we are aware of the issue and are closely working with Verifone to resolve.

newstitle: Cash Redemption on Valero Gift Cards
newsbody: There is an update to the list of states that allow a customer to redeem a Valero Gift Card for cash.  Click here to view the list.
